headline: Arista Networks (NYSE:ANET) Expands Board With Intel CTO As Stock Dips 17% Over Past Week
summary: Arista Networks (NYSE:ANET) recently expanded its Board of Directors by appointing Greg Lavender, CTO at Intel, amid executive changes including John McCool's upcoming transition to a senior advisory role. Additionally, Arista announced advancements in AI cluster capabilities aimed at enhancing performance efficiency. These company-specific developments took place against the backdrop of a turbulent market, with major indices experiencing significant declines due to tariff turmoil, impacting...
